    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

}

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Dubai Adventure Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/dubai-tour-packages" title="Dubai Tour Packages">Dubai</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Dubai Adventure Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c31b2e39ae1_24529811" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/include/dubai-adventure_f7l1d0.jpg" alt="Dubai Adventure Tour Package" title="Dubai Adventure Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Dubai, the dreamy land of brash, 7 stars attracts luxury-loving tourists from far and wide. The year-round sun over Dubai makes it an uncomfortably warm place. To beat the scorching heat, tourists prefer to stay indoors and splurge as much as wealth they can on the indoor luxuries at a seven star hotels. These days adventure lovers too are drawn to Dubai. The best season to enjoy adventure activities in Dubai is between months October and April when the climate of the place remains relatively cool and pleasant. That’s the time when adrenaline junkies flock heavily in Dubai to enjoy lots of thrilling actions on land, air and sea. Enjoy the most memorable adventures in Dubai by setting out for this 5N/6D Dubai adventure tour.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Dubai Adventure Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrive Dubai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon your arrival at the international airport, Dubai you’ll be greeted by tour representative who then escorts you to your pre-booked hotel. On reaching check into hotel, freshen up and relax yourself. In the evening set out to visit the Burj Khalifa, a 555 meters high super tall tower soaring up into the sky…this is the tallest tower in the world offering one with an amazing 360-degree view of Dubai right from Persian Gulf to the desert of Arabia and even beyond. The experience of boarding the world’s most high-speed elevator to reach the top and that of viewing the amazing city from heights by means of high powered telescopes are memorable ones. Come back amazed and spend overnight at the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Half City Tour of Dubai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Next day post breakfast; proceed for an amazing half day city tour of Dubai. The places you get to visit during this tour are Jumeirah mosque, Dubai museum, Atlantis the Palm, Burj Al Arab photo-shop. The experience of enjoying the Jumeirah Palm Monorail ride would be the key highlight of this tour. Back to hotel for dinner and night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Desert Safari Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Today we’ll soak in one of the most iconic experiences in Dubai; the desert safari tour. While you set out for the safari, you’ll be a part of one of the most unique experiences that seems to be straight from your childhood fantasy world of the Arabian nights. Things and activities you can enjoy during your desert safari tour are dune driving, camel riding, sand boarding, belly dancing shows and to wind it up all, a lips-smacking barbeque dinner that makes you feel royal and knightly. Back to hotel for dinner and night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Dhow Cruise Ride</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Next day, you are at leisure. You may enjoy the cozy comforts of staying indoors in your hotel room and stock up energy for the adventurous cruising that is in your cards for the evening. In the evening set out for cruising your way through Dubai by means of the Dhow Cruise. The traditional wooden Dhow vessel snakes its way on the Dubai Marina and Dubai Creek while you get to enjoy an exotic BBQ dinner onboard and visualize the enchanting, magical nightlife from the deck. Post dinner and cruising return back to hotel for overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>At Leisure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>The day is left for you to enjoy at leisure. Wake up late, savor a leisurely breakfast and then set out to explore the vast array of shopping opportunities that Dubai has. The city flaunts the most futuristic of shopping malls in the whole of the world along with the celebrated, sparkling gold souk. Shopaholics often refer to Dubai as their paradise. The other metaphors enjoyed by Dubai are ‘Bargain hunter’s haven’, ‘shopping capital of the middle east’. A visit to Dubai is incomplete if you haven’t shopped to your heart’s fill. So, make sure to pick souvenirs and also make sure to bargain to the best of your skills. Back to hotel for rest, dinner and night stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Check out of hotel, reach Dubai International Airport and board flight back to homeland with lots of cherish-able memories for the rest of your life.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="tour-collection">

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Dubai Adventure Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Do You Require The Services Of A Tour Guide In Dubai?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The short answer is no, you do not need a tour guide to travel to the UAE or to enjoy your experience. However, if you want to learn more about the Emirates' traditions, culture, people, and history, you should travel with a local tour guide.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Dubai?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> May, September, and October are considered the shoulder seasons. May is significantly hotter than November, with temperatures ranging from 23 to 36 degrees Celsius, but it is only the beginning of summer in Dubai.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Month In Dubai Is The Coldest?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> During the month of January, the temperature in Dubai averages around 20°C. While it is the coldest month in Dubai, it is relatively warmer when compared to the weather in northern and central India during this time.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Kind Of Fruit Is Famous In Dubai?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Dates are the most popular fruit in the UAE because they are chewy, sweet, and nutritious.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>

excerpt.rendered: Dubai Adventure Tour Package Home » International » Dubai » Dubai Adventure Tour Package Tour Overview Dubai, the dreamy land of brash, 7 stars attracts luxury-loving tourists from far and wide. The year-round sun over Dubai makes it an uncomfortably warm place. To beat the scorching heat, tourists prefer to stay indoors and splurge as...
